TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

Docs.summary: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations sur le `DocumentStructure` élément d’un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] du package, consultez le chapitre 9 dans le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spécification, que vous pouvez obtenir sur [XPS : spécification et téléchargements de licence](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
Docs.returns: An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations sur la `DocumentStructure` élément d’un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] du package, consultez le chapitre 9 de la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spécification, que vous pouvez obtenir sur [XPS : Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
